metadata.title: CVE-2019-10133 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle before 3.7, 3.6.4, 3.5.6, 3.4.9 and 3.1.18. Theform to upload cohorts contained a redirect field, which was not restrictedto internal URLs.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
